dict.acceptation: 认识，识别；承认，认可；褒奖；酬劳；

sent.orig: Include: neural networks, handwriting character recognition, fingerprint recognition, voice recognition, face recognition, expert systems.
sent.trans: 内容包括：神经网络，手写体文字识别，指纹识别，语音识别，人脸识别，专家系统等。

sent.orig: Development of new projects are: facial recognition systems, voice recognition systems and iris recognition systems.
sent.trans: 开发的新项目有：面像识别系统、声音识别系统及虹膜识别系统等。

sent.orig: Face detection, face recognition, object identification, observation substrate recognition, statistical shape recognition, machine learning.
sent.trans: 人脸侦测，人脸辨识，物件辨识，观测基底辨识，统计形状辨识，机器学习。

sent.orig: A common classification, commonly used in face recognition, palmprint recognition, pattern recognition.
sent.trans: 一种常用的分类器，常用于人脸识别、掌纹识别等模式识别领域。

sent.orig: In Chinese speech recognition, the speech recognition ratio of continuous large vocabulary is comparatively poor.
sent.trans: 汉语语音识别中连续大词汇量的语音识别率较差。
